entity.name: dataproduct_solr_v
entity.query: WITH dataproduct AS ( SELECT 'foreground' AS facet, 'datasetview' AS subclass, name AS ident, name AS display, NULL AS synonyms, CONCAT_WS(', ', 'map', 'layer') AS keywords, 'qwc_demo' AS desc_org, '[]' AS children_json_array, FALSE AS dset_info FROM qwc_config.resources WHERE type='map' ) SELECT (array_to_json(ARRAY[subclass::text, ident::TEXT]))::text AS id, display, children_json_array::text AS dset_children, dset_info, CONCAT_WS(', ', display, synonyms) AS search_1_stem, CONCAT_WS(', ', display, synonyms, desc_org) AS search_2_stem, CONCAT_WS(', ', display, synonyms, desc_org, keywords) AS search_3_stem, facet FROM dataproduct
